Translations.Text: te'o kaya visaya babata puchatacha kari rahya che
te moti sucana babata vise
jena vise te'o matabheda kari rahya che
cokkasapane te'o najikamam jani lese
phari cokkasapane te'o najikamam jani lese
sum ame dharatine patharanum nathi banavyum
ane parvatone khunta (nathi banavya)
ane ame tamane jodakamam peda karya
ane ame tamari nidrane tamara arama mate ja banavi
ane ratane ame parado banavyo che
ane divasane kamani mate banavyo
ane ame tamara upara sata majabuta akasa banavya
ane eka camakato divo (surya) banavyo
ane vadalomam thi musaladhara varasada varasavyo
jethi tenathi anaja ane vanaspati upajave
ane harya-bharya baga. (Pana upajave)
ni:Sanka phesalano divasa nisrcita che
je divase suramam phukavamam avase, pachi tame jutha na jutha cali avaso
ane akasa kholi nakhavamam avase. Temam dvara ja dvara tha'i jase
ane parvatane calavavamam avase, to te maricika banine rahi jase
ni:Sanka dojhakha ghatamam che
duracari'o num thekanu te ja che
jemam te'o aganita varso sudhi padya rahese
na temam thandi tatha pinum cakhase
sivaya garama pani ane (vahetu) paru
(Temane) sampurna badalo malase
ni:Sanka te'o hisabani asa ja nahata rakhata
ane bebakithi amari ayatone juthalavata hata
ane ame dareka vastune gani ganine lakhi rakhi che
have, tame (potani karanini) maja cakho
ni:Sanka darava vala'o mate ja saphalata che
bagica'o ane draksa che
ane navayuvana kumarika'o
ane chalakata pyala
tyam na bakavasa sambhalase ane na to juthi vato sambhalase
(temane) tamara palanahara taraphathi (temana sara karyo no)a badalo malase. Je bharapura hase

(te palanahara taraphathi malase je) akaso ane jaminano ane je kami pana temani vacce che teno palanahara che, ane te khubaja mapha karavavalo che, ko'ine pana tenathi vatacita karavano adhikara nahi hoya
je divase ruha ane pharista'o katarabandha ubha hase, ko'i vata nahi kari sake sivaya te, jene atyanta dayalu paravanagi ape, ane te yogya vata kahese
te divasa nisrcita che. Have je icche te potana palanahara pase (sara karyo) kari thekanu banavi le
ni:Sanka ame tamane najikamam ja avanari yatanathi daravi didha (ane cokanna kari didha) che. Je divase manavi tena hatho'e karela (karma) jo'i lese, ane kaphira kahese ke kadaca hum mati tha'i jata
dubine sakhtithi khencavavala'o na soganda
bandha kholine chodavi denara'o na soganda
ane tarava-pharanara'o na soganda
pachi dodine agala vadhanara'o na soganda
pachi karyani vyavastha karanara'o na soganda
je divasa dhrujavavali dhrujase
tyarapachi eka pachala avavavali (pachala-pachala) avase
(ketalaka) hrdaya te divase dhadaki rahya hase
temani ankho jhukeli hase
kahe che ke sum ame phari pahelani sthitimam lavavamam avisum
Sum te vakhate jyare ke ame ogali gayela hadaka tha'i ja'isum
kahe che, pachi to a pachu pharavu nukasanakaraka che
(khabara hovi jo'i'e) basa a eka (daravani) jhatakani che
pachi (jena prakata thavani sathe ja) te'o tarata ja medanamam bhega tha'i jase
sum musa (a.Sa.) Ni vata tamane nathi pahonci
jyare pavitra ghati â€œtuvaâ€ mam tene tena palanahare pokaryo
(ke) tame phira'auna pase ja'o, ni:Sanka te vidrohi bani gayo che
ane tene kaho, sum tum pavitra thava mage che
ane hum tara palanahara tarapha margadarsana karum jethi tu (tenathi) darava lage
pachi tene moti nisani batavi
to tene juthalavyum ane avaganana kari
pachi pitha batavine dodava lagyo
pachi saune bhega kari pokarya
tamara sauno palanahara hum ja chum
to (sauthi unco) allaha'e pana tene paraloka ane sansarani yatanamam gheri lidho
hakikatamam amam te'o mate siksa che je'o dare che
sum tamaru sarjana vadhu kathina che ke akasa num? Allaha'e tenum sarjana karyu
teni chata unci uthavi ane tene santulana apyum
ane teni rata andhari banavi ane divasane prakasita karyo
ane tyarapachi dharatine (samatola) pathari didhi
tenathi pani ane ghasa-caro upajavyo
ane parvatone (sakhata) khodi didha
a badhu tamara ane tamara pasu'ona labha mate (che)
to jyare moti aphata (pralaya) avase
te divasa manavi potana karmone yada karase
ane (dareka) jovavala same jahannama dekhiti kari devamam avase
to je (manavi'e) avajna kari (hase)
ane dun'yavi jivanane prathamikata api (hase)
(tenum) thekanum jahannama ja che
Ha! Je vyakti potana palanahara same ubho rahevathi darato rahyo hase, ane potana manane manamani karavathi roki rakhyum hase
to cokkasa pane tenum thekanum jannata ja che
loko tamarathi kayamata avavano samaya puche che
tamane teni carca karavani si jarura
tenum jnana to allaha pase ja che
tame to phakata tenathi daravavala'o ne saceta karanara cho
je divasa te'o tene jo'i lese to evum lagase ke phakata divasani eka sanja athava teni pahora (duniyamam) rokaya che
